description: This file defines a React component named FilterPanel used for filtering tasks or cards in a Kanban board application. It includes helper functions, state management, and UI elements for various filter criteria such as assignees, priorities, statuses, columns, and due dates. The component provides interactive controls, filter badges, and filter chips for managing and displaying active filters.

methods.name: getUniqueFieldValues
methods.description: Helper function to extract unique, case-insensitive, trimmed, deduplicated values for a specified field from a list of cards.

methods.name: Badge
methods.description: React component that displays a styled badge with a count, used for showing number of selected filters.

methods.name: FilterPanel
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders a comprehensive, accessible, and touch-optimized filter panel for a Kanban board, managing multiple filter criteria and displaying active filters.
